notes: First generation compact SUV. Body-on-frame construction with part-time 4WD. Timing belt engine requires regular replacement. Unique convertible soft-top variant available. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Sportage article, January 2025 revision.

First generation compact sedan. First Kia model designed for North American market. Timing belt engine requires regular replacement. Data sourced from Wikipedia Kia Sephia article, January 2025 revision.
